name: Bill Ward
description: '''William Thomas Ward''' (born 5 May 1948) is an English drummer. He was a co-founder and the original drummer for the [[hard rock]] band [[Black Sabbath]]. Ward helped found Black Sabbath in 1968 alongside bandmates [[Ozzy Osbourne]] (lead singer), [[Tony Iommi]] (guitarist), and [[Geezer Butler]] (bass).
